channel.title: How to enable staking while at duel
channel.description: so in my duel arena i can put items into a stake it says it was disable due to glitches but i need to turn it off so if anyone can tell me how to fix this I'd greatly appreciate it.here is my tradeandduel java file [url=http://pastebin.com/5Cihfmtk]http://pastebin.com/5Cihfmtk[/url] fixed forgot to add the link :)

item.title: How to enable staking while at duel
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

No, just those 4 lines in your TradAndDuel.java should fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: How to enable staking while at duel
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Removing

if (!c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Terrence")) {
c.sendMessage("Staking has been disabled due to dupes and glitches, will be fixed soon.");
return false;
}

Will allow you to stake, but it will not fix any glitches.

Read full topic

item.title: How to enable staking while at duel
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Nicksworld:

so in my duel arena i can put items into a stake it says it was disable due to glitches but i need to turn it off so if anyone can tell me how to fix this I’d greatly appreciate it.here is my tradeandduel java file

You didn’t post any file.

Also, if it says it was disabled due to glitches, you should probably fix the glitches before enabling it.
